item.title: Knights of the Spinward Stars
item.description: Knights of the Spinward Stars Holovids and galactic historians speak of events unimaginably distant in both time and space: the fall of the Second Imperium after the Scream, the arrival of Ra, myths of the Terran homeworld.

item.title: Houserules and Campaign Details
item.description: WIP Lancer and Stars Without Number Class Bonuses to Mech War Warriors can use their luck ability to automatically hit when piloting a mech, and also add their increased hit bonus in mech combat.

item.title: Character Creation Details
item.description: WIP (Work In Progress) Creating Characters A human being should be able to change a diaper, plan an invasion, butcher a hog, conn a ship, design a building, write a sonnet, balance accounts, build a wall, set a bone, comfort the dying, take orders, give orders, cooperate, act alone, solve equations, analyze a new problem, pitch manure, program a computer, cook a tasty meal, fight efficiently, die gallantly.

item.title: Archdruid Panicratos
item.description: Dryad Druid (Circle of the Thorn) 14 Str 10 Dex 12 Con 12 Int 14 Wis 17 Cha 18 HP: 118 + 10 (heart amulet) AC: 16 Feats: War Caster Resilience (Constitution) +2 Wisdom feat Prof: +4 Intelligence saves Wisdom saves Constitution saves Nature Perception Survival Stealth Dryad Innate Spellcasting Magic resistance Speak with Beasts and Plants Tree Stride Fey Charm Druid druidic circle of the thorn Spellcasting 0 - 3 known Primal Savagery Thorn Whip Guidance 1 - 4/day Absorb Elements Entangle Healing Word Protection from Iron* 2 - 3/day Heat Metal Animal Messenger Spike Growth Pass without Trace* 3 - 3/day Call Lightning Dispel Magic Aura of Vitality Plant Growth* 4 - 3/day Grasping Vine Shamblerâ€™s Shield* 5 - 1/day Wrath of Nature Repel the Works of Man* 6 Wall of Thorn 7 Whirlwind Equipment Thornmail Bleeding Heart Crown of the Ivy Lord Staff of the Rooted Hills 30 Life essence .

item.title: Bleeding Heart
item.description: An amulet made from a still living human heart wrapped through with ivy and thorns, used as the primary ritual focus for the Circle of the Thorn. allows participation in greater rituals can communicate with plant creatures and can expend a use of wild shape to attempt to turn plant creatures as a cleric turns undead casts Aid on to wearer every day as the heart beats .

item.title: Thornmail
item.description: Armor made of living thorns. Medium armor AC 15 + Dex (max 2). Can use reaction to deal 1d4 piercing damage to a melee attacker.
